Reviews.Title: Blackberry
Reviews.Author: deborahburgess
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Just as they said it would be. It would have been nice to get a little more detail about how the smartphones are more expensive monthly than the other phones for people like me, who didnt know that. But, all in all it is a very nice phone, there is nothing wrong with it!

Reviews.Title: Phone came with a JVM Error 102
Reviews.Author: Charlotte W. Allen
Reviews.Content: Phone took me 2 days to get the error off so I would be able to use it.  The people at Verizon were not able to get it working.  After hours of trying and downloading.  Buying a Driver program for $40.  I was finally able to get it fixed with a download!  Hopefully the phone will not give me any more problems.  It looks good.  I love it for now other than the horrible issues I went through to get it working! :(

Reviews.Title: occasionally works
Reviews.Author: Beth J. Cobbs
Reviews.Content: After a few days my cell phone would randomly show *#***###****## & i couldn't use phone not answer calls etc very frustrating hopefully will get refunded

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: Allie Brandon
Reviews.Content: OK Phone not very user friendly.  But ok if you ned a spare phone. Would be nice for a young college girl or a young female executive

Reviews.Title: Super Cute and Functional!
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Lott
Reviews.Content: The phone came sealed in a box and in plastic, so I could tell that it was fairly new! There were screen protectors on the front and back of the phone in order to prevent smudging. The design is absolutely cute and it came in no time from when I ordered it. So far I am pleased with the quality of the product and have not had any troubles with it. Have not experienced the applications woes, but I have a tablet in which I can play apps and such on. Just needed this phone as a replacement and it is working excellent at that! It comes with a wall charger along with a USB adapter for computer usage or can be used as a car charger option.The only cons I have is that this phone did not come with a manual or SD card, but I have learned how to cope without and look up any questions about functions that the Setup Wizard did not address. This really does not affect how I feel about the phone. Just thought you should know that it is not included.

Reviews.Title: Usar en Argentina
Reviews.Author: Clau
Reviews.Content: Quisiera comprarlo.Pero no se si funciona en argentina para la compañia Movistar.Como hago para averiguarlo??Grcias!!! Es muy lindo.Si alguien me pudiera decir.

Reviews.Title: aOMEBODY PLEASE ANSWER?????
Reviews.Author: Lizeth
Reviews.Content: iS THIS A VERIZON CELLPHONE??????? answer AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. I have no idea how this cellphone works, planning to buy it but I NEED TO KNOW IF IS A VERIZON CELLPHONE
